<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Pesgahi the Poisoner](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2048)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Poison Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Infused Items** Pesgahi carries the following infused items, which last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: [lesser antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80) (2), [lesser smokestick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=135) (2), [moderate acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (6), [moderate frost vials](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77) (4)

**Items**
[Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [_bracelet of dashing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=415), formula book

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 60
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 piercing plus ghoul fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 slashing plus paralysis

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
acid flask +13 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 1 acid damage plus 2d6 _persistent acid damage_ and 2 acid [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
frost vial +13 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 2d6 cold damage plus 2 cold [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** Pesgahi is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** Pesgahi devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 2d6 Hit Points. He can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 19; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) the next midnight.

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by Pesgahi's attack must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Quick Bomber** <actions string="Single Action" />  Pesgahi can use Interact to draw a bomb and then Strike with it.

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) Pesgahi jumps up to half his Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions

</column>
